descriptionHtml:
[size=24pt][color=orange]Completely Standalone Dark Brotherhood for PCEAr [/color][/size]

[youtube]fEkVlyK_pR0[/youtube]

INTRODUCTION

First and foremost , [color=red]I have been given permission[/color].

Turns the Dark Brotherhood armor into a PCEAr armor

Dark Brotherhood for PCEAr CHSBHC/UNPB/CBBE comparability
